text: it's incredibly useful for grabbing data off posts and pages in other contexts
is there a faster way to move HS drag and drop templates from one directory to another without having to go into each one and choose move?
on the same note, if you delete the default templates that come with a HS Portal (Landing Page Basic folder) can you restore or re-download these?
If you can FTP them from one to another I'd say that makes sense (but then again I don't remember ever seeing D&D templates in FTP)
